hero.title: Welcome to the Pagefinder Lore Page
hero.text: Scroll down to learn about the lore

introduction.title: In Search of Pages: LORE
introduction.content:
In the beginning, there was the word. And even now, the word remains the most powerful tool of influence. In the game 'Pagefinder,' the word is your primary weapon with which you cleanse and save the world. 

On your journey to uncover the truth, you will save a friend, discard a few yellow newspapers, and smack a couple of spider faces. You are in for a journey into a tragic world, but one that will still make you laugh.

prism.title: Prism
prism.content: The main character is Prism, a 20-year-old guy, the youngest in the group. His goal is to find all the pages of the lost diary of his friend Clementine. Though he is calm most of the time, his fiery temper surfaces rather quickly. He’s the first to jump into battle to protect what he holds dear.

dexterity.title: Dexterity
dexterity.content: Dexterity, or Dex. Her name means agility, which tells you she’s fast, cool, and sharp. She’s 23 years old and serves as the healer. Always carrying her typewriter, she’s ready to strike with undeniable facts. However, she’s not always careful with her words, which can lead to misunderstandings.

page.title: Clementine
page.content: Clem, or Clementine, or something else—it’s not her real name, but her friends love calling her that. The orange-haired girl is always in her hat and always trying to sniff out something. Despite being very sweet, she harbors many secrets and unspoken thoughts. Unfortunately, she has disappeared, so all we can do is search for the pages of her diary.
